name: The Silver Hand
ideology: Purify Skyrim of lycanthropy and Hircine's corruption
description: Anti-werewolf vigilante faction that splintered from the Companions long ago. The Silver Hand believes the Companions were corrupted by Hircine and operate from forts and hidden dens across Skyrim. Not officially recognized as noble, they are organized into autonomous warbands under a High Purifier.

purists.name: Purists
purists.description: True believers. Religious Nord traditionalists who hate all Daedric influence.

radicals.name: Radicals
radicals.description: Want to wipe out the Companions entirely. Use torture and extreme methods.

shadow_patrons.name: Shadow Patrons
shadow_patrons.description: Possibly Thalmor manipulation via an anti-Nord destabilization agenda.

escalation_thresholds.2: Ambush event triggered against beastblooded PC or allies
escalation_thresholds.3: Fort siege against a known Companions stronghold
escalation_thresholds.4: Named NPC hunt — High Purifier dispatches elite killers
escalation_thresholds.5: Jorrvaskr assault — full Silver Hand strike on the mead hall
escalation_thresholds.6: Final Purge quest — all-out war against the Companions and their allies

notable_members: High Purifier Valdrek Ice-Blood (leader — former Companion)
Sister Kaari of the Cleansing Flame (priestess-zealot)
Unknown Thalmor Agent (hidden — supplies silver, encourages chaos)

relationships.companions: Bitter enemies — Silver Hand views the Companions as Hircine-corrupted traitors to Ysgramor's legacy
relationships.stormcloaks: Uneasy tolerance — shared Nord traditionalism, but Silver Hand distrust of anyone harboring werewolves
relationships.imperial_legion: Ignored — Silver Hand sees Imperial entanglements as irrelevant to their purification mission
relationships.thalmor: Unknown manipulation — a hidden Thalmor agent funds and directs the Shadow Patrons branch

gm_notes: Use Silver Hand as a reactive nemesis faction for beastblooded PCs. If the PC never takes Beast Blood they remain a background faction and can even be infiltrated to expose Thalmor involvement. Escalation clock ticks whenever Beast Blood is used publicly.
